p: Silver nitrate (AgNO 3), MB, MO, RB, RB5, 2,2â€²-azino-bis(3-ethylbenzothiazoline-6-sulfonic acid) (ABTS), 2,2-Diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH), Cell Counting Kit-8 (CCK-8), and other chemicals were obtained from Sigma-Aldrich (Saint Louis, MO, USA). The Annexin V FITC Apoptosis Detection Kit was obtained from BD Biosciences (San Jose, CA, USA). All of the other chemicals used were of analytical grade.
